feature_model.name: AttributesCD
feature_model.feature_tree: :r AttributesCD (AttributesCD) :m EmptyOMOD (EmptyOMOD) :m LinksOD (LinksOD) :m CompletenessCD (CompletenessCD) :m ObjectTypingOD (ObjectTypingOD) :m AttributesOD (AttributesOD) :m EmptyOMCD (EmptyOMCD) :m ODSemantics (ODSemantics) :m ObjectsOD (ObjectsOD) :m ClassesCD (ClassesCD) :m CompletenessOD (CompletenessOD) :m CDSemantics (CDSemantics) :m TypesOD (TypesOD) :m CDODConsistency (CDODConsistency) :g [1, 1] : AllowLinksOmittedOD (AllowLinksOmittedOD) : AllLinksShownOD (AllLinksShownOD) :g [1, 1] : AllowObjectsOmittedOD (AllowObjectsOmittedOD) : AllObjectsShownOD (AllObjectsShownOD) :g [1, 1] : NonStrictOD (NonStrictOD) : StrictOD (StrictOD) :g [1, 1] : EmptyOMInvalidOD (EmptyOMInvalidOD) :m EmptyOMInvalidCD (EmptyOMInvalidCD) : EmptyOMValidInstanceCD (EmptyOMValidInstanceCD) :m EmptyOMValidInstanceOD (EmptyOMValidInstanceOD) :g [1, 1] : AllTypesShownOD (AllTypesShownOD) : AllowTypesOmittedOD (AllowTypesOmittedOD) :g [1, 1] : AllAttributesShownCD (AllAttributesShownCD) : AllowAttributesOmittedCD (AllowAttributesOmittedCD) :g [1, 1] : AllAttributesShownOD (AllAttributesShownOD) : AllowAttributesOmittedOD (AllowAttributesOmittedOD) :g [1, 1] : AllowClassesOmittedCD (AllowClassesOmittedCD) : AllClassesShownCD (AllClassesShownCD)
feature_model.constraints: constraint_1:~AllowObjectsOmittedOD or AllowLinksOmittedOD constraint_2:~AllowClassesOmittedCD or AllTypesShownOD constraint_3:~AllowTypesOmittedOD or AllClassesShownCD constraint_4:~AllLinksShownOD or AllObjectsShownOD
